rows.label: qev012101_MSG0001
rows.name: Hellooooo...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012101_MSG0002
rows.name: Uh, over here! ...Hello? Yeah, up here![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012101_MSG0003
rows.name: Chief![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012101_MSG0004
rows.name:
It's me! Mia! ...The lovable scamp who keeps
brightening your life?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012101_MSG0005
rows.name: Killer view up here. You should join me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012101_JNK0010
rows.name: Climb

rows.label: qev012101_SEL0011
rows.name: Head up and join Mia.

rows.label: qev012101_JNK0020
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: qev012101_SEL0021
rows.name: Stay where you are.

rows.label: qev012101_MSG0006
rows.name: Careful! It took me like four tries to make it up here![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012101_MSG0007
rows.name:
A woman of weaker will would've wept,
but not Mia![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012101_MSG0008
rows.name:
I think that deserves some praise, right?
Along with my awesome alliteration abilities?
Oh, snap! I did it AGAIN! Wooo, Mia![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012101_MSG0009
rows.name:
Sooo...get up here already, would you?
I'm getting tired of shouting![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012101_MSG0010
rows.name: Whaaat? Come oooooon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012101_MSG0011
rows.name:
You're really going to pass up this vista?
What, you hate beauty or something?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012101_MSG0012
rows.name:
I promise I won't tell anyone if you trip and
fall right on your pretty face.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012101_MSG0013
rows.name: Toootally worth it! I promise![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012101_MSG0014
rows.name: Now c'mon! Get your booty up here![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012101_MSG0015
rows.name: Some workout, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012101_MSG0016
rows.name:
Although you beat the pants off my time.
Sheesh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012101_MSG0017
rows.name: But how about this view? Can't beat it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012101_MSG0018
rows.name: Moments like these make adventuring all worth it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012101_MSG0019
rows.name:
Traversing unknown lands! Seeing new sights!
Breathing air never before breathed![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012101_MSG0020
rows.name:
You can't get this feeling of total awe from a picture
or video feed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012101_MSG0021
rows.name: I just love it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012101_MSG0022
rows.name: I guess it's genetic...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012101_MSG0023
rows.name: My parents were explorer types, too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012101_MSG0024
rows.name:
They were actually pretty well known back on Earth.
Set a world record for summiting Mt. Everest as a pair.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012101_MSG0025
rows.name:
They even had a TV station that sponsored them.
Seriously! An entire station![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012101_MSG0026
rows.name: But when I was 15, they...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012101_MSG0027
rows.name: The mountain wasn't even that tough.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012101_MSG0028
rows.name:
They apparently made it to the top just fine,
but on the way down, they just...vanished.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012101_MSG0029
rows.name:
There was a huge search and all that,
but no one found even a single trace.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012101_MSG0030
rows.name: I don't think they got cocky, either.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012101_MSG0031
rows.name:
I watched them pack that morning,
and they were as careful as ever.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012101_MSG0032
rows.name:
...Anyway, they taught me the joys AND the
dangers of adventuring.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012101_MSG0033
rows.name: And I want to keep their spirit alive, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012101_MSG0034
rows.name:
If they were here, they'd be going nuts
exploring the heck out of this crazy planet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012101_MSG0035
rows.name:
But they're not, so now it's up to me.
Because SOMEONE's got to![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012101_MSG0036
rows.name: I mean, just look![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012101_MSG0038
rows.name:
Mira's literally a huge pile of stuff you could
never see on Earth![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012101_MSG0039
rows.name:
I could spend my whole life out here and not
see even a tenth of it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012101_MSG0040
rows.name:
So I need to hurry up and see everything
I CAN see. For my parents, and for me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012101_MSG0041
rows.name: ...Whuh?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012101_MSG0042
rows.name: AAAAAH! I'm falliiiing!

rows.label: qev012101_MSG0043
rows.name: OR AM I?! ...What in the heck?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012101_MSG0044
rows.name: A nice birdie saved me! ...Wait, no, it didn't![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012101_MSG0045
rows.name:
Oh, hell no! I am NOT going to be eaten
like some worm![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012101_MSG0046
rows.name: AAAAUUUGH! HELP ME, CHIEEEEEEF!
